title.rendered: New partnership with The Bot Platform

content.rendered:
Exciting times in Boys + Girls as we’ve recently invested in The Bot Platform and will be their Irish partner. The Bot Platform was founded in 2017 and offers a form of automated communications, helping marketers to use Messenger and Workplace by Facebook as part of their channel marketing. As one of the founders Syd says, “There is, quite simply, no other communication channel where you can get the majority of people to read the message within 1 minute – the results are phenomenal. As self-professed pioneers in automation and the future of communications, we’re delighted that Boys and Girls have come on-board as both an investor and as our Irish agency partner”. 

We’ll be working closely with the guys and offering access to The Bot Platform for our clients. Stay tuned!
